Portland.First & Main:
First & Main is a 17-story, 210.34 ft (64.11 m) office tower in downtown Portland, Oregon, at First and Main streets. The building was completed in 2010 at a cost of $100 million with Hoffman Construction as the general contractor for developer Shorenstein Property Services.


== History ==
The land the building occupies was previously a surface parking lot, long considered a potential location for a new Multnomah County Courthouse.
